They reach a desert island on which they will have to survive on their own. But beware: pirates are approaching! Good thing Captain Mom is there to save them and prepare them a delicious heartwarming dinner after all these adventures!

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: When Turbulent comes back with a balloon he got for free on the beach, Poet is jealous. But the balloon lady thinks its Turbulent coming back and refuses to give Poet the balloon hes asking for.She gives the same answer to Girl, thinking Turbulent is disguised. Enough is enough! The Triplets are sick and tired of people getting them mixed up, they want to be different. Maybe if Poet got fat or Girl changed her hair color, people would make the difference?

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: Woodsy is looking very gloomy today, but his family has no idea why. Rosie and Scoutbadger decide to do everything they can to find out what is wrong with him. They try to make him confide in them, to follow him around discreetly, to question his friends… eventually making Woodsy angry: he doesn’t want to talk about it, and that’s it!

programme.title: Caillou’s New Adventures
programme.desc: Caillou goes to the water park and faces pirates, races down lazy river, and rides a big slide!

programme.title: Caillou’s New Adventures
programme.desc: Caillou gets stung by a bee, but learns that bees are special creatures that dont want to hurt people!

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: When Thomas finds out that the Earls Technology Fair will bring new inventions to Sodor, he sets out to prove that steam engines are the best inventions ever.

programme.title: Chuggington 03
programme.desc: Dr. Ling is giving a talk about meteors and how, many years ago, one crashed right near this area. Brewster pulls in a real meteorite, borrowed from the museum. Dr. Ling demonstrates that you can move the meteorite with a magnet, as meteorites contain metal. Hoot and Toot are afraid the meteorite might escape and destroy Chuggington, so they decide to return it to space. They take it up the mountains and try to catapult it into the sky, but it falls to earth and races toward the city! Hoot and Toot chase it as it rolls around Chuggington. With the trainees’ help, they capture it, using the magnetic crane.

programme.title: Chuggington 03
programme.desc: An ice storm hits Chuggington and Koko really wants to help. She sees her chance when she comes across one of the anti-freeze cars. She thinks she’s de-icing the tracks, but she’s actually making them even icier - she doesn’t realise that the car contains water. Because of her actions, Eddie and Emery get stranded out in the cold. Koko admits her mistake and does what she can to help Calley rescue them. When Eddie and Emery are back, safe and warm, Koko promises she’ll never do anything like that again without checking with someone first!

programme.title: Charley Goes To School
programme.desc: This evening, Anna is taking them for a pony ride! Particularly enthusiastic, Charley spends the day telling his friends what a great knight he is! But when its time to get in the saddle, he makes a sudden move, frightening his horse, who then starts neighing loudly... Scared, Charley invents excuses not to go for the ride on his pony. Will he be able to overcome his fear?

programme.title: Ruff Ruff, Tweet And Dave
programme.desc: Ruff-Ruff, Tweet and Dave take their Rollypods to the Rollypod Garage for a bubble makeover! They fix Dave’s broken car-hooter, pump up their tyres so their Rollypods will go faster and polish up their paintwork until it sparkles. Then it’s time to show off their shiny new vehicles in a friendly Rollypod race!

programme.title: Doodleboo
programme.desc: What makes for a balanced meal? Doodleboo explains how to draw a Chef !

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Jane and Zumi engage in a friendly race in the savanna, reaching a hillside where they discover a young Black Wildebeest calf stuck in a mudhole. Back in the Garden, Katie is documenting a sick plant full of ladybugs to help get healthy again. Leo, Katie and Hero get a call from Jane and after learning about the wildebeest the team travels to Jane to rescue the calf. They try to approach the wildebeest to get it onto a harness but it only gets further into the mud hole. With the wildebeest still stuck and the threat of a nearby lion, Ranger Rocky joins them and helps the team by providing comfort of wildebeest grunts which allows the team to execute the rescue plan. With PlatypusOne, they lift the calf from the mud, deciding to reunite it with its herd. A heartwarming reunion occurs as the calf is released among its herd. In the garden, Katie celebrates the success of her plants growth with the help of ladybugs.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly - Fairy Cards Mepe
programme.desc: Zephyr and Leapy decide to make a little surprise box for Dr Owls most beloved belongings. They want to decorate the box with shells, so the Robin flies them to the seashore to collect the most beautiful shells. They even get some help from the Crab, and get a ride back home on a back of a turtle.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly - Fairy Cards Mepe
programme.desc: One day Stanley gets a silver robot from Frank as a present. The robot can move, make sounds and also flash its lights. When Stanley wants to show it to Berry, the robot slips from his hands and breaks into pieces. While Stanley and Berry are out to get some help, Bubbles finds the robot and repairs it.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly - Fairy Cards Mepe
programme.desc: During Christmas, Dr Owl gets sick, and Bubbles cant seem to wrap his head around the fact that doctors can also get sick. Flutter helps him understand that the car of a car mechanic can also break down, and the shoe of a cobbler can also get torn sometimes. So the friends make a beautiful surprise for the old doctor.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly - Fairy Cards Mepe
programme.desc: There are two balls in the kindergarden. One, the big bugs play with, and one for the small bugs. One day one of the balls bursts and they all have to find a way to peacfully play with the one remaining ball. Soon they realize that they can also play together, so Stanley admits that the small bugs are not that clumsy after all.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly - Fairy Cards Mepe
programme.desc: The Moonbug cant walk. The centipede always helps him to get him to where he wants to go. But one day the centipede has to go on a long journey, so the Moonbug is left to go alone to Alfonsos concert. But Eddy, the potatobeetle builds a special chair with wheels for Moonbug. The Moonbug can finally go alone to Alfonsos concert, and anywhere he wants to.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing loves Arlo the cat. They are friends. Bing strokes the kitty and they play hide and seek, but what happens when Bing meets a cat that isnt as friendly?

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Flop find a patch of fluffy dandelions and blow all but one. Bing takes the last one to give to Sula but when she hugs him to say hello, the dandelion blows away.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing is vooshing with Hoppity around the garden, making him fly higher and higher. With one particularly enthusiastic throw Hoppity disappears. After a hunt, Bing finds Hoppity in the washing up bowl and gets upset because a wet, mucky Hoppity just doesn’t feel right.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and his friends play Nature Explorers in Ammas garden by spinning a giant colour wheel and then finding something of that colour in the garden.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing has enough money to buy one thing in Padgets shop but he finds it hard to choose between all the lovely things. After much deliberation Bing chooses a campervan but on the way home he begins to regret his decision.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcakes Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: The twins birthday is approaching. Sour says she does not wish to share the birthday with Sweet. Sweet is sad that her sister feels that way but respects her wish. Sour initially enjoys having a birthday of her own and the activities the Berry girls plan for her, but gradually feels lonely without her sister, and regrets what she said earlier.

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: Its the first day of summer, which badgers celebrate and call Happy Poppy Day. Edmund wants to prepare Yolanda’s delicacies, a sweet specialty, which Scoutbadger, Woodsy and Berry’s mother used to bake on that day using poppy flowers. To make these delicacies, you need poppies, the recipe and thecontainers in which they should be served…

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Spring is coming and Little Nutbrown Hare and Little Field Mouse are very brave and go on a journey through the meadow to discover the source of a mysterious – and slightly spooky - creaking sound. They follow the clues to discover… it’s the frozen lake melting, and singing as it does!

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare and Little Field Mouse pick lots of delicious strawberries. Little Nutbrown Hare eats all his and runs out so Little Field Mouse shares hers with him. When he goes to collect some more for his friend he eats them all too. Little Field Mouse shows him how to eat them really slowly to make them last longer.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Berry, Dolly, and their friends are picking apples when an old steam locomotive appears on the hill. At the request of the scarlet beetle train engineer, the little friends help repair the locomotive and paint the wagons in bright colors. The cinnabar beetle thanks them by taking them on a special train trip to the great waterfall. The friends enjoy the journey and have a fun day together. At the end of the trip, they happily return home with the colorful train.

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Sam got a wrong idea about what Julias life was like when she lived on her island. Julia try to show Sam by immersing him in a tropical atmosphere, reconstituted at the Mouse Mansion.

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: To participate at the annual cheese hunt with the other children of the residence, Julia faces a problem : she has a cold and cant sniff anything. Sam is going to help her to play with them anyway!

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: It’s the night and The Triplets and Grandpa are at the beach to observe the night of the shooting stars. The Triplets are really really excited and ask a lot of questions to Grandpa. He explains to them that when you discover a new star you can name it after yourself, and when you see a shooting star you must make a wish. When they see their first shooting star, the Triplets wish for exactly the same thing, to have their own little star, The Triplet’s star!

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: In Grandpa’s garden, Turbulent is fascinated by the super heroes’ stories he can read in his book. He wishes too to be a Kind Vigilante who saves the lovely and the helpless. Unfortunately, every time he tries to save someone, his sister who stucked her kite in a tree or his brother who is afraid of a spider for example, Grandpa always comes first and fixes the problem. When Turbulent was at the most discouraging point, a new villain appears ant kidnap all the people he loves, the Kind Vigilante is back in business!

programme.title: Chuggington
programme.desc: New to Chuggington, Tai must navigate her way around town to make an important delivery.

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: When Tom Thomas tries to help the Pioneers earn their bird watching badges using a fancy new APP, his phone obsession causes him to tumble over a cliff! Without Tom to fly the helicopter, it’s up to a mysterious new character to save the day…

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Sarah is excited to shadow Sergeant Rose Ravani until she gets stuck filing maps. But when Gareth and Nipper go missing in the woods, Rose leads their rescue mission

programme.title: Kate And Mim Mim
programme.desc: When Kate’s ant farm breaks, she wonders how to get the ants back in their home. In Mimiloo, Lily has found hatching humming turtle eggs! Cowgirl Kate must find a way to round up the baby humming turtles and lead them to their mama in the Singing Seas.

programme.title: Kate And Mim Mim
programme.desc: Kate gets frustrated playing mini golf in the back yard. In Mimiloo, it’s Make-Up-A-Game Day, so Kate helps her friends combine the best parts of their favourite games to make up a brand new game! Mim-Mim really wants to win his very first trophy—but first, Kate will have to help him find his strengths to master the game.

programme.title: Caillou (new 3D) Mepe
programme.desc: After a safety demonstration at school, Caillou goes overboard trying to accident-proof his house. But in a secret agent fantasy where an Agent (Caillou) almost fails a mission because of an actual safety bubble, Caillou realizes that accidents happen, but you can always be prepared.

programme.title: Caillou (new 3D) Mepe
programme.desc: Caillou is having too much fun playing Space Captain to go to sleep, so he pretends to be Dax Turbo, trying to keep his sleepy crew awake so they can complete their mission, and learns that everyone needs time to rest and recharge, even intrepid space captains.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: James likes to show off and be the centre of attention, but when he doesn’t get his own way, he sulks and pouts. One day James is showing off so much that the passengers start complaining so the Fat Controller takes his coaches away. James starts to pout and he is still pouting the next morning. He is so sulky and rude that the Fat Controller leaves him in his shed. Eventually James apologises and the Fat Controller gives him some work to do, but when James discovers that he’s pulling waste trucks he starts sulking again and it is only when his friends help him laugh at himself that James finally manages to find a way to dowhat he has to do, and even enjoy it!

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Kyle invites Leo, Katie and Hero to scuba-dive at the beach. Its a beach party! The boys bust out their signature animal dance moves. Just as Kyle does the dolphin, he spots a big-belly seahorse bullying another big-belly seahorse. On closer inspection, the rangers realise that theres no bullying. On the contrary, the seahorses are in love. But it seems its going to take a lot more work for the male seahorse before the female accepts him. The rangers are on it!

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: The Mountain Gorillas have elected a new leader... Ranger Rocky! But wheres the original silverback leader?

programme.title: Postman Pat Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Everything mechanical in Greendale is going crazy! What is going on?

programme.title: Postman Pat Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: The kids are hiking to the top of Greendale Crag so that they can zipwire down.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: When Coco and Charlie come to play at Bings house they measure how tall he is, but when they get the measuring ritual wrong, Bing is scared hes growing down!

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing is disappointed he cant go play because hes all sneezy but Sula and Amma bring him a nice carroty bagel to help him get better.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing is playing Hide And Seek at the crèche with Sula, Pando and Coco. Bing doesn’t go to the toilet with all the others before the game starts and when he needs to go before he is found he has to decide whether to give up his hiding place or try and hold on.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Flop are making ginger bunny biscuits for Charlie and Coco.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: The series follows a pre-school bunny named Bing as he experiences the world around him. It uses small everyday occurrences to demonstrate how he learns new ways to manage situations with the help of his carer, Flop and friends. The programmes central phrase is Its a Bing thing! which Flop intones at the end of each episode when Bing has successfully conquered a troubling task or enjoyed a new childhood experience.

programme.title: Oswald
programme.desc: Henry and Daisy stop talking to each other after a big argument and poor Oswald ends up being stuck in the middle. After many failed attempts to patch things between the quarrelsome duo. Oswald discovers it is only when he gets into a spot of trouble that Henry and daisy pull together to rescue him and they all become friends again.

programme.title: Oswald
programme.desc: Oswald and the gang are eagerly making preparations for the following day’s Big City Autumn Festival. There is a lot of excitement and activity in the air and once the preparations have been made everyone retires for the night in eager anticipation of the next day. The following morning, however, they wake up to find it has snowed overnight, making plans for a Big City Autumn Festival seem ruined. But ever the optimist, Oswald shows everyone that they can have an even better time in the snow.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Saffi declares that Wendy is her hero. She then tells the Spring City Rockets that her hero is going to build them a fancy tree house so that they can have their first ever club meeting. Wendy wants to live up to her hero status and re-organises the schedule so that the elaborate tree house is ready by the end of the day. But things don’t quite go to schedule when Saffi tries to help out. Saffi arranges furniture on wet paint and then causes Wendy to stick to adhesive. Things then get worse when Saffi uses the tree-house before it is ready, causing it to collapse. Now not only does Wendy have to save the collapsing tree-house but also the Rockets prize cup. With the help of Bob, Wendy dangles from a harness to retrieve the prize cup.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: When Bob takes Pilchard for her check-up, he discovers that the Vet Tilly is looking after a dog named Cooper... and he likes to chase cats. Vet Tilly panics as Mayor Madison is arriving that evening with her cat to be groomed. She doesn’t want Cooper to chase the Mayor’s cat! Bob suggests making a reception area that keeps cats and dogs separate and immediately the Vet commissions the build. Now working against the clock, Bob and the team have to complete the new reception area before the Mayor arrives. But on promising to keep the animals away from the building work, Leo accidentally lets Pilchard escape from her basket and doesn’t return to collect Cooper. Bob can’t continue his work until all the animals are out of the way.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare discovers that everyone else can whistle but him… the birds, Little Grey Squirrel, Otter and even the wind in the river reeds. Inspired by the wind, he practices really hard and eventually learns to blow through a reed himself to make it whistle. He and his friends make a beautiful and eerie whistling symphony amongst the reeds.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare tries to jump high enough to reach a last Autumn apple on a high branch. Unable to reach it, even with the help of Little Field Mouse, he gives up. But after watching some little salmon struggling to swim up a waterfall he decides to ‘think like a fish’ and try, try, try again until he reaches the tasty prize.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare falls into a muddy Autumn puddle and is delighted when he startles Little Grey Squirrel, who doesn’t recognize him at first. This starts a great new game of ‘Surprise!’ as they dress up in disguises to surprise the others. But they weren’t ready for Little Field Mouse, who works out a clever way of surprising her friends even more.

programme.title: Learning Time With Timmy
programme.desc: Timmy and his friends are having a picnic. How many apples, cakes and drinks do they have?

programme.title: Hurray for Huckle!
programme.desc: The Pig Twins discover a puddle full of stranded goldfish. Huckle and his pals try to solve the mystery of where they came from. It turns out they were blasted out of the park fountain when an obstruction in the drain hole suddenly got unplugged./ A mysterious message on Sgt. Murphy’s radio has Huckle and the gang baffled!

programme.title: Messy Goes To Okido
programme.desc: In the real world, Messy is lazing in his sandpit when he hears something that sounds like a tiny invisible engine? “Aww” smiles Messy as he sees it’s only a little buzzing bumble bee! He watches it land on a nearby garden flower and wonders why bees like flowers anyway? He vortexes himself to Okido to find out. Messy lands in Okido, where Zoe and Felix seem very down in the dumps. Whats wrong? Messy asks. They explain they’re sad because their tomato plants haven’t produced any tomatoes just flowers.

programme.title: Messy Goes To Okido
programme.desc: In the real world, Messy does a BIG sneeze and finds he had a tiny hair in his nose! But its so small he loses it immediately... This gets him wondering, whats the smallest thing there is?! Messy goes to Okido to find Zoe and Felix just in time to catch Zim star as guest on Mayor Okis TV show! Mayor Oki introduces Zim, Okidos expert on everything! but Mayor Oki thinks he knows better than Zim “everything in the world is made of sandwiches” he says! Zim corrects him, “actually Mr Mayor, everything in the world is made of something very small, we call them atoms”.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcakes Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: Lemon and Raspberry make the final preparations for the contest. Strawberry offers the twins to be models at the contest instead of her. Sweet is delighted, but Sour is not excited. Shortly before the show is broadcast, Sour sabotages the TV equipment.

programme.title: Harry And His Bucket Full Of Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Harry is reluctant to have a bath so he goes to Dino-World where he endeavours to become as dirty and stinky as he possibly can.

programme.title: Harry And His Bucket Full Of Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Harrys friend Charlie brings her new kitten (Buster) to visit Harry.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: In the Alaskan wilderness, Jayden witnesses a grizzly bear cub being swept away in a river. Hero, Leo, and Katie, in the Garden, are practicing a search and rescue mission, with Heros flotation device when Jayden contacts them about the cub’s emergency. After a quick info segment about grizzly bears, they travel to Alaska in PlatypusOne. They try to chase after the cub but the river then divides into two ways. Unsure which way the cub went, the team split up with Katie and Hero flying ahead with their jetpacks to find the cub. Leo and Jayden then encounter Ranger Rocky who suggests they seek advice from Ranger Joey. Hero comes back to the boys and signals that he didn’t find the cub. Katie then joins them and warns them that the cub is approaching dangerous rapids. Hero is tasked to find the mother bear while the team rushes to the cub. When they reach the cub, it’s clinging to rocks as the rapids are pulling it away. They drop Heros flotation device and Hero practices his rescue skills, enabling the cub to safely reunite with its mother. Back at the Treehouse, they hang a picture of the rescued cub and its mom, concluding the successful mission and in the Garden, Hero is enjoying his well deserved time in the pool.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: Gordon is going about his usual business when something extraordinary happens – he can’t stop giggling! What starts as a little chuckle soon turns into full blown hysterics and… Gordon HATES IT! The more he tries to stop laughing, the worse it gets and he’s convinced if Sir Topham Hatt/Fat Controller sees him in this ‘silly’ state, he’ll take the Express from him and give him ‘silly’ jobs instead. Desperately, he heads to Steam Works to be fixed, where he learns that a little bit of laughter doesn’t do anybody any harm!

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: In Brazil, Thomas meets Gustavo, a big, blue engine who reminds him very much of Gordon.

programme.title: Grisu
programme.desc: Maria ordered way too much stock and if she doesnt sell hundreds of pizzas today, everything will be ruined! Grisu offers to do some advertising to bring people in. After a shooting session, Grisu Stella and Fume distribute and stick flyers and posters around the city. But Fume overzealous sticks his posters anywhere. Grisu has to catch up with his fathers mistakes and ends up burning the cart full of flyers. After his despair moment, Grisu has the idea to do an air show. With his father, they draw a giant pizza in the sky, made with colored smoke...and it works.

programme.title: Grisu
programme.desc: Stella is taking part in a dance video contest and she asks Grisu to dance along with her. The young dragon accepts immediately. But as soon as they start filming, Fume comes in and asks his son to do dragon training with him. He then unwittingly makes Grisu fall and botches the shot. From then on, Stella and Grisu keep changing location so that they can shoot in a quiet place, meaning without Fume. But the older dragon shows up anyway and ruins the shot, albeit unvoluntarily.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare awakes to find the leaves changing colour and falling off the trees, the flowers dropping off the bushes and the tadpoles turning into frogs. Autumn is here and it’s time for change! Little Nutbrown Hare misses the joys of the Summer meadow. Will he discover that Autumn has it’s own delights?

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: The cool Autumn breeze isn’t enough to deter Little Nutbrown Hare and Little Field Mouse from going out to find what special experiences the day might bring. However, with the weather and wind constantly changing, it’s very hard for the friends continue playing any one game. Will the strange weather spoil their fun, or will it bring them a special experience after all?

programme.title: Chuggington Badge Quest
programme.desc: To earn their badges, the trainees must be efficient when picking up litter, which means not wasting any time. Wilson and Koko race off, each determined to finish first. Methodical Brewster goes more slowly, sorting the litter as he goes into 3 different bins: paper, plastic and cans. Koko and Wilson deliver their messy loads to the recycling yard – but it won’t count until it’s sorted! While a happy Brewster collects his badge, Koko and Wilson are still sorting their litter....

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: Near the riverbank, Rosie, Woodsy and Scoutbadger find a glass jar containing a genuine pirate map! Without a second thought, our heroes decide to go search for the treasure. Quick as ever, Rosie and Scoutbadger spot the clues and solve the puzzles,without noticing that Woodsy has a hard time keeping pace with them. The poor badger feels more and more useless, and eventually decides to give up the search…

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Mayor Madison has arranged for Ballroom Blitz, TV dance sensation, to come on tour to Spring City. When star dancer, Sylvain de Souza, threatens to cancel the show unless he gets a sprung dance floor, Maria enlists Bob to save the day, in return for a show tango with her hero. Dance fever sweeps Team Bob and the Spring City Rockets but Lofty despairs of ever being able to dance as well as the others. Just as he finds his dancing mojo, Lofty accidentally wrecks part of the sprung dance floor. Sylvain recognizes a kindred spirit in Lofty and urges him to follow his dreams, no matter how unlikely they may seem.

programme.title: Gekkur
programme.desc: Vit halda 25 ára føðingardag hjá Gekkinum í kvøld. Gekkurin verður frameftir sendur í nýggjum hami og nýggir vinningar eru í fokus. Upphæddirnar á hjolinum hækka, so tað nú ber til at vinna millum 20.000 og 50.000 kronur á hjolinum. Og ein Volvo-bilur fer í annan leypin og ein luksus-cruise til Bahamas við 50.000 kronum í lummapeningi í hin leypin. Stora gekkaupphæddin er í triðja leypinum.Raðspælið verður eisini meira spennandi, tí ein krússapottur við virði á 50.000 kronur fjalir seg aftan fyri eina av lúkunum.

Miller) at samla starvsfelagarnar til eina episka jolaveitslu. Veitslan skal imponera ein møguligan kunda og fáa eina avtalu í lag, og hon skal bjarga starvi hansara.Upprunah.: Office Christmas PartyVið eru: Carol Vanstone: Jennifer Aniston, Josh Parker: Jason Bateman og Clay Vanstone: T.J. Entree, plat, dessert : chacun prend son tour aux fourneaux. Puis vient la degustation où le chef livrera son avis d’expert et partagera un vrai moment de complicite avec ses invites. Et si c’etait autour d’un plat que les celebrites se montraient les plus authentiques ?

programme.title: Incroyables transformations

Mais pour nos experts, pas de soucis, car aucun look ne les arrete.

programme.title: Incroyables transformations
programme.desc: Des experts de la mode ont cree une agence pas comme les autres pour venir en aide à des clients qui se plaignent du look de lun de leurs proches, quil est urgent de changer ! Mais pour nos experts, pas de soucis, car aucun look ne les arrete...

programme.title: M6 boutique
programme.desc: Retrouvez les dernières innovations et des offres exclusives en matière de bijoux, beaute, cuisine, maison.

programme.title: Ça peut vous arriver
programme.desc: Julien Courbet va tout tenter pour resoudre vos problèmes mais aussi apporter des infos juridiques et conseils specifiques. La parole est donnee à toutes les parties pour que toutes les situations litigieuses trouvent un denouement positif !

programme.title: Ça peut vous arriver chez vous
programme.desc: Julien Courbet, entoure davocats et dexperts, tente de resoudre vos problèmes mais aussi apporter des infos juridiques et conseils specifiques. Des envoyes speciaux sillonnent les regions, recueillent les temoignages et illustrent les cas en images.

programme.title: Meteo
programme.desc: La meteo de M6 vous fera decouvrir un lieu en France symbolique du derèglement climatique ou des solutions apparues pour le combattre. Sur place, Gennifer Demey, Cali Morales et Stephanie Duval vous expliqueront les causes de ces perturbations climatiques et leurs consequences sur les paysages, la faune, la flore et les habitants de ces endroits de France concernes par le sujet.

programme.title: Le 1245
programme.desc: Retrouvez toute lactualite de la mi-journee.

programme.title: Scènes de menages
programme.desc: Votre couple vous desole ? Vous vous lamentez de vivre seul ? Scènes de Menages va vous aider à relativiser !

programme.title: Un jour, un doc
programme.desc: « Un jour, un doc », le magazine qui vous fait decouvrir des loisirs, metiers et activites extraordinaires de Français, dans lHexagone et à l’etranger. Positif, informatif, depaysant, « Un jour, un doc » met en avant des personnalites et des lieux, tels que vous ne les avez jamais vus.

programme.title: Un jour, un doc

programme.title: La roue de la fortune
programme.desc: De nombreux candidats vont tenter leur chance pour denicher les mots et expressions caches, tout en esperant decrocher les plus gros gains offerts par la roue. Mais attention, ils devront eviter la redoutable banqueroute et les autres pièges qu’elle reserve. Chaque jour, les participants se donneront à fond pour vivre des moments palpitants et atteindre la finale, où ils pourront remporter jusqu’à 20 000 euros ou un voyage de reve à l’autre bout du monde.

programme.title: La meilleure boulangerie de France
programme.desc: Pour cette 12e saison, Bruno Cormerais, Noëmie Honiat et Michel Sarran se lancent à nouveau à la decouverte des meilleures boulangeries de France. En mettant à l’epreuve les artisans boulangers dans leurs etablissements, et au travers de defis tailles sur mesure, ils les jugeront avec appetit, gourmandise et bienveillance.

programme.title: Meteo
programme.desc: La meteo de M6 vous fera decouvrir un lieu en France symbolique du derèglement climatique ou des solutions apparues pour le combattre. programme.title: Pekin express : la route des glaces

programme.desc: Aterballetto is the principal producing and touring dance company in Italy. They are well-known for their ability to shift their style across a wide range of musical genres, from classical to pop and jazz. Jiří Pokorny‘s ‘Words and Space’ is a metaphor of an intrapersonal speech, a book full of floating stories. It is personal, intimate, and very poetic.

programme.title: Closed - A Ballet from Real Life
programme.desc: Many people live in a closed world. What happens to them when they step onto an arena where they can be themselves, free of their usual roles and status? In the film Closed we encounter four completely different people who once a week leave their everyday lives and get together in a closed cafe, where they get the opportunity and help to relax and momentarily distance themselves from reality. These encounters have a certain touch of ritual to them. Here, the participants dare to open themselves up to external impressions. They allow themselves to be affected by each other’s liberated exposures and to respond positively to what society at large would regard as strange behaviour. Two men, one woman and a proprietor who is obsessed with cleaning. The smallest speck of dust must be removed immediately. He always has a dust cloth to hand. This externalized and bizarre behaviour is challenging to himself as well as to those around him. Music: Zoltan Kodály’s Sonata for solo cello Op. 8 by cellist Truls Mørk.

programme.title: Strauss: An Alpine symphony - DSO Berlin, Robin Ticciati, Reinhold Messner
programme.desc: Richard Strauss 1864 - 1949 Eine Alpensinfonie. Berlin, Tempodrom, 2021. Recorded at Berlin’s Tempodrom, the Deutsche Symphonie-Orchester Berlin and its chief conductor Robin Ticciati present Richard Strauss’s ‘An Alpine Symphony’ as a musical and philosophical mountain hike with the legendary mountaineer Reinhold Messner. The concert leads us through the Alps, lets the audience pass flowering meadows en route, through thickets and underbrush, over mountain pastures and glaciers to the summit, and finally the descent surrounded by thunderstorms. Messner provides insights into the physical and psychological borderline experiences of his mountain ascents and speaks about extreme situations, the perception of nature, and his mental state on the night before departure, during the conquest of the peak, during the long, onerous descent and the exhausted, contented return home.. Directed by Andreas Morell.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: I Port Protection hjalper Sam Breanna och Oliver att finslipa sina kunskaper infor den stundande bjornjakten. Carl foljer i sin pappas fotspår for att sakra sin och Morgans framtid. Curly och Squibb dammar av sina fardigheter infor den kommande sågverksflytten. Matt hjalper Veronica att anta sin tant Litzis roll for samhallets basta.

programme.title: Beskyddare av egyptens skatter
programme.desc: Arkeologer spårar den anmarkningsvarda utvecklingen av de forntida egyptiska pyramiderna och avslojar hur dessa enkla lerstenkonstruktioner forvandlades till ett av varldens storsta arkitektoniska underverk. Medan ett team letar efter en forsvunnen kungs gravkammare gomd i en forfallen 4 500 år gammal pyramid, utforskar ett annat team en mystisk grav nara den allra forsta pyramiden.

programme.title: Beskyddare av egyptens skatter
programme.desc: Arkeologer som utforskar uppkomsten av Egyptens forsta faraoner undersoker hur de forvandlade spridda samhallen till ett maktigt kungarike. Från den dramatiska enandet av de två landerna till byggandet av Egyptens tidigaste monument, avslojar utgravningar hur dessa banbrytande harskare formade en civilisation som var amnad att bestå i årtusenden.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: Efter att ha hittat en enorm last metamfetamin gomd i en jarnvagsvagn arbetar granspolisen i El Paso for att hindra kartellen från att ta tillbaka den. I Miami, efter att en liga som tillverkat falska pass har gripits, vander sig den huvudmisstankte snabbt mot sin egen mor. Senare på Newark Airport gor poliser en chockerande upptackt – 48 kilo misstankt kott.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: Granspolisen i Newark griper en passagerare med resvaskor fulla av marijuana. Senare i El Paso arresterar polisen två systrar som de misstanker ar inblandade i en manniskosmuggling. Och på JFK:s internationella postkontor upptacker ett team plundrade antika statyer varda 500 000 dollar.

programme.title: Dranerade varldshav
programme.desc: Anfallet mot Pearl Harbor overraskade USA:s flotta och fick en plats i historiebockerna. Genom att dranera Hawaiioarna med hjalp av den senaste tekniken avslojas inte bara den avancerade tekniken hos japanernas ubåtar och stridsflygplan som gjorde det mojligt att sanka amerikanska slagskepp, utan aven att sjalva slaget startade långt tidigare och var mycket mer omfattande an man tidigare trott.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim Fuzz ger sig in i den bisarra men underbara varld som ar Bond Bug, en trehjulig bilflopp. Bilen tillhor en 69-årig man vars drom om att gå med i Bond Bug-agarklubben och delta i lopp och utstallningar forstordes av Parkinsons sjukdom. Car SOS-ganget kliver in for att få bilen korduglig medan han fortfarande kan njuta av den.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim och Fuzz reser till Wellingborough for att hamta en Fiat Uno Turbo från 1988, en av de snabbaste på sin tid i sin klass. Bilen tillhor bilforsaljaren Gerry, en oforbatterlig racingkille. Tyvarr har Gerrys dåliga halsa inneburit att hans Uno fått stå och rosta på hans infart. Hans vanner och slaktingar hoppas att Car SOS-behandlingen kommer att ingjuta lite ny gladje i Gerrys liv.

programme.title: Nazisternas megabyggen
programme.desc: Hitlers Siegfriedlinje var over 630 km lång och en av historiens storsta forsvarssystem. Det tog mer an sex månader att ta sig igenom den och kostade de amerikanska styrkorna 140 000 offer. Det har ar berattelsen om mannen som byggde den och uppoffrade sitt liv for att forsvara och forstora den.

programme.title: Nazisternas megabyggen
programme.desc: De europeiska landerna faller som dominobrickor och Hitler ar overtygad om sin militara skicklighet. Han tanker invadera Ryssland och beordrar byggandet av ett enormt hogkvarter av bunkrar och byggnader - Vargskansen. Men medan han isolerar sig i sin betongstad borjar kriget att glida honom ur handerna och en komplott organiseras for att forvandla den hemliga basen till Hitlers gravplats.

programme.title: Romarrikets forsvunna skatter
programme.desc: Hur blev Colosseum - en arena for blodiga gladiatorstrider - den storsta symbolen for det romerska riket? Arkeologer vågar sig in i Colosseums ruiner och påborjar gravningar over hela imperiet for att jaga efter ledtrådar. Nar teamen går ner i dolda tunnlar och graver fram sedan lange forsvunna amfiteater i Toscana och Storbritannien, pusslar de ihop den overraskande sanningen om Roms ikoniska Colosseum.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Semestertider innebar mycket jobb. Thord stalls infor en utmaning som kan få livet att balansera på en skor tråd.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: Under den skoningslosa vintern måste invånarna i Port Protection garantera sin sakerhet till varje pris. Sam Carlson, Dave Squibb och Stuart Andrews från den lokala frivilligbrandkåren genomfor brandovningar. Gary Muehlberger soker efter någon som kan hjalpa honom att reparera hans fiskebåt. Matt Carlson och Kaylee Burk tar med sin dotter på ett spaningsuppdrag for att sakra viktiga resurser.

programme.title: FLY
programme.desc: Folj tre par i den spannande men farliga varlden av BASE-hoppning, dar de riskerar allt for att uppleva kanslan av att verkligen vara vid liv.

programme.title: Haverikommisionen
programme.desc: Med bara minuter kvar till landning kraschar China Airlines Flight 140. Utredarna soker igenom resterna av planet, men det de hittar komplicerar bara mysteriet ytterligare.

programme.title: Haverikommisionen
programme.desc: Continental Airlines Flight 1713 får tillstånd att lyfta efter flera dagars forsening på grund av snofall. Men planet hinner knappt lyfta forran det kraschar.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Nar en laxtransport kraschar i diket blir det startskottet for en natt av kaos for Thord. Medan Thord och Bjorn forsoker radda lastbilen och dess vardefulla last, måste Thord skicka Domenic på ett solouppdrag for att kontrollera en kaotisk situation på en okand olycksplats. Med Thords kapacitet pressad till det yttersta måste Terje och Ørjan radda en buss som kraschat ner i ett dike.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Nar lastbilar kor forbi i hog fart for att ta sig upp for en backe satter Thord sitt liv på spel for att radda en lastbil som sladdat till stillastående på isen och undvika att fyrtiotonnaren glider tillbaka in i motande trafik. I norr kampar Raido mot isiga forhållanden for att barga en fiskbil. Men vagen ar så forradisk att det ar svårt att ens stå upp, vilket gor att raddningen verkar omojlig.

programme.title: Egyptens solkung: Hemligheter och skatter
programme.desc: Arkeologer upptacker att den forsta graven innehåller en kropp sedan Tutankhamon. Mumierna visar sig vara en prinsessa och en adelskvinna, samt ytterligare 30 mumier. Gradvis hittar man svaren på vilka de var och varfor de befinner sig har. Vilka var de då? Att losa pusslet kraver timmar av detektivarbete och den senaste tekniken for att pussla samman dessa mystiska gravars fantastiska bakgrund.

programme.title: Mysterious Islands
programme.desc: Ruiner som gravts ut på Pitcairn Island kastar ljus over en tidigare okand civilisation. I Borneos djungel upptacker forskare ett markligt gront ljus i den beckmorka skogen. Resterna av ett sedan lange forsvunnet tempel hittas i forruttnelse på den grekiska on Euboea. Korallrester som gravts upp på Suakin Island i Sudan avslojar det livfulla forflutna for ett marint handelscentrum i Roda havet.

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: Vi undersoker om Turinsvepningen verkligen ar Jesu begravningskladnad, varfor jetpacks aldrig slog igenom trots sin innovativa design, och det 2 400 år gamla mysteriet med guldkoppar.

programme.title: Europas blodiga historia
programme.desc: Tudorhistorikern dr Suzannah Lipscomb och journalisten Joe Crowley slår sig samman for att undersoka de extraordinara berattelserna om tre av Europas mest obehagliga figurer, från en av Roms mest fruktade kejsare till Ungerns egen Greve Dracula. Forst tar man sig en titt på varfor den unge kejsar Caligula, med hela det romerska imperiet vid sina fotter, styrde sitt imperium genom fruktan och galenskap. Darefter undersoker man hur en dekorerad fransk krigshjalte forvandlades till en okand barnamordare, samt faktan kring hur en åldrande ungersk anka blev kand som ”grevinnan Dracula”.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: I Port Protection hjalper Sam Breanna och Oliver att finslipa sina kunskaper infor den stundande bjornjakten. Carl foljer i sin pappas fotspår for att sakra sin och Morgans framtid. Curly och Squibb dammar av sina fardigheter infor den kommande sågverksflytten. Matt hjalper Veronica att anta sin tant Litzis roll for samhallets basta.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: Invånarna samarbetar for att flytta ett 500 kg tungt sågverk till Carls och Morgans egendom. Squibb faller vanskliga trad for att få mer solljus och bygga ut sitt solenergisystem. Sam, Oli och Bre ger sig ut på en ny bjornjakt. Nykomlingen Veronica tar hjalp av Jiggy for att bli battre på att fiska.

programme.title: Beskyddare av egyptens skatter
programme.desc: Arkeologer som utforskar uppkomsten av Egyptens forsta faraoner undersoker hur de forvandlade spridda samhallen till ett maktigt kungarike. Från den dramatiska enandet av de två landerna till byggandet av Egyptens tidigaste monument, avslojar utgravningar hur dessa banbrytande harskare formade en civilisation som var amnad att bestå i årtusenden.

programme.title: Beskyddare av egyptens skatter
programme.desc: Medan de utforskar Egyptens episka maktkamp med sina sodra rivaler, nubierna, upptacker arkeologer i Karnak anmarkningsvarda ledtrådar som avslojar hur kushitiska kungar tog kontrollen från en dynasti i forfall. Djupt inne i ostra oknen gors extraordinara upptackter i gamla smaragdgruvor.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: Granspolisen i Newark griper en passagerare med resvaskor fulla av marijuana. Senare i El Paso arresterar polisen två systrar som de misstanker ar inblandade i en manniskosmuggling. Och på JFK:s internationella postkontor upptacker ett team plundrade antika statyer varda 500 000 dollar.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: I San Ysidro, varldens mest trafikerade landgransovergång, upptacker polisen fentanyl, heroin och kokain gomt i ett fordon. Senare genomfor ett team från Homeland Security i Miami en hemlig operation mot en illegal vapenliga. Under tiden inspekterar gransvakterna på Dulles International Airport kurirer efter en serie narkotikabeslag nyligen.

programme.title: Europa från ovan
programme.desc: Denna spektakulara luftfard avslojar Norge på ett helt nytt satt. Flygande kameror avslojar tekniken bakom varldens langsta undervattenskabel, svavar over huskies och fångar Norges mest tursamma brevbarare på hans fantastiska rutt från o till o. Langs detta enorma och vilda landskap som formats av glaciarer avslojar vi den revolutionerande arkitektur som forvandlar Norges kust.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Efter att ha lyft från Jakarta i Indonesien - den dodligaste flygplatsen i varlden - svanger Sriwijaya Air Flight 182 plotsligt hårt åt vanster, flyger i en spiral och stortar med nosen ned i Javasjon. Den kraftiga kraschen pulveriserar planet. Och nar utredarna borjar grava i flygdatan upptacker de en mangd dodliga defekter som på något satt har gått igenom systemet.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Ett turbopropellerplan ar på vag ner i tat dimma over Luxemburg nar något går fruktansvart fel. Luxair Flight 50 kraschar bara några kilometer från landningsbanan. Utredarna står handfallna nar de inte hittar något fel på någon av motorerna. Men nar de analyserar mystiska ljud som fångats upp av cockpitens rostinspelare upptacker de ett idiotsakert system som ar allt annat an det.

programme.title: Inside Melbourne Airport
programme.desc: En spand nodsituation uppstår nar olagliga droger hittas ombord på ett flygplan, ambulanspersonal skyndar till undsattning for en kvinna med symtom på hjartinfarkt, och en inblick i flygledningen avslojar hur olyckor undviks. På en annan plats visar flygplatspersonalen upp sig på en catwalk, men kommer deras unika modevisning att bli en succe eller ett misslyckande?

programme.title: Engineering Europe
programme.desc: På en spannande resa genom Tysklands storsta tekniska underverk avslojar vi den innovativa teknik som gor det mojligt for ingenjorer att bygga jarnvagslinjer 40 meter under Munchen. Darefter avslojar vi hemligheterna bakom en rekordbrytande svangbro over floden Ems, forundras over en båtlyft som transporterar lastfartyg genom luften och besoker den komplexa restaureringen av varldens hogsta kyrka.

programme.title: Bob Ballard Special: Titanics hemlighet
programme.desc: Det var det mest storslagna skeppet som någonsin byggts och dess ode ar ett mysterium. På vilket satt ar vrakets upptackt kopplat till det kalla krigets morkaste dagar.

programme.title: Radda Titanic med Bob Ballard
programme.desc: Bob Ballard, National Geographic och Woods Hole Oceanographic Institute, planerar en expedition till vrakplatsen i Nordatlanten - juli 2011.

programme.title: Gallipoli´s Deep Secrets
programme.desc: På sin senaste undervattensresa undersoker upptackaren av Titanic, dr Robert Ballard, en av 1900-talets storsta vandpunkter. I vad som skulle bli en av de blodigaste och mest meningslosa striderna i modern tid vill Ballard undersoka hur det kunde gå så fruktansvart fel. Svaren finns inte bara på slagfalten utan aven under vågorna.

programme.title: Toronto Airport Uncovered
programme.desc: Minustemperaturer, sno och is på Toronto Pearson Airport pressar varldens storsta avisningsstation till sina granser. Utomhus kampar arbetarna med frusna lastdorrar och vattenledningar, medan det inomhus utbryter kaos nar personalen får ta hand om en skadad flygvardinna, arga passagerare och en inkraktare i ett av flygplatsens farligaste områden.

programme.title: Dranerade varldshav
programme.desc: Slaget vid Jylland var bland de mest våldsamma havsstriderna i historien som utkampades år 1916 mellan de brittiska och tyska flottorna. Efter en dag av blodbad utropade båda sidor seger. Men vem vann egentligen? Sjofartsarkeologer och historiker dranerar Nordsjon for att undersoka de mest forodande stridsfartygen under Forsta varldskriget och ta reda på vad som hande dem nar striden var over.

programme.title: Dranerade varldshav
programme.desc: Spannande bevis kommer fram från civilisationer som var dolda under vatten i århundraden. Från mystiska undervattenspyramider på Japanska kusten till den magiska staden av Atlantis. Men ar dessa verkligen antika platser? Genom modern teknik avslojas vad som faktiskt doljer sig under ytan och TÖM HAVEN tar reda på svaren.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: På Hardangervidda slår sig Thord och Bjoern samman for att radda en lastbil och slapvagn som kraschat i diket. De två cheferna ar oense om hur raddningsaktionen ska gå till – men på berget finns det bara plats for en chef. I norr ar Ole Henrik nu delagare i sin fars firma. Nar en lastbil med en vardefull last blommor behover raddas ar pressen på honom storre an någonsin.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Thord måste testa sin nya lastbil med roterande kran nar en traktor kraschar nedfor en backe och hamnar på taket. I norr ar Raido på vag att barga en skolbuss som har kort ner i ett dike, men han blir forsenad av två andra raddningsuppdrag. Bilentusiasten Bjorn får ett mote med en elbil.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: Nar vintern narmar sig forbereder sig invånarna i Port Protection på att stanga in sig. Curly hjalper Oliver att ta in några cedertrad, Carl och Morgan ger sig ut for att fiska coho-lax och Veronica och Terri forbereder sig for att laga en god måltid. Under tiden hjalper Sam Troy och Sarah med en storre uppgradering av hemmet och Jiggy ger sig ut for att falla en sista alg for sasongen.

programme.title: Europa från ovan
programme.desc: Denna spektakulara luftfard over Europa avslojar julen på ett helt nytt satt, från ett blandande ljuståg langs Englands kust till en extraordinar logistisk prestation på Tomtens postkontor. Darefter korsar vi kontinenten for att bevittna en fantastisk monsterparad, ett alpint jattefyrverkeri samt Finlands ikoniska renhjordar.

programme.title: The Infinite Explorer with Hannah Fry
programme.desc: Från flamenco i Madrid och paella i Valencia till ett visslande språk på Kanarieoarna, Barcelonas geometriska charm och till och med manskliga pyramider, avslojar vi Spaniens kulturella hemligheter.

programme.title: Vikingarnas krigardrottningar
programme.desc: Den gangse uppfattningen har alltid varit att vikingakrigarna var man, men nu utmanar nya upptackter allt vi tidigare trodde oss veta. National Geographic-upptackaren Ella Al-Shamahi anvander modern teknik och banbrytande vetenskap for att bevisa existensen av elittrupper av kvinnliga vikingakrigare som levde och stred for over 1 000 år sedan.

programme.title: Vikings: The Rise and Fall
programme.desc: Ett anfall mot det religiosa samhallet på den heliga on Lindisfarne år 793 inledde vikingaerans erovringar och expansion, men innan dess ska vi studera vikingarnas begynnelse i Skandinavien.

programme.title: Top Guns: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Att landa på ett hangarfartyg – en viktig fardighet for alla stridspiloter i den amerikanska flottan – kraver absolut precision. Nar eleverna står infor den langsta och mest kravande fasen av utbildningen vet de att detta test kommer att avgora deras framtid i cockpit. Under den okande pressen borjar vissa vackla, vilket leder till en skarp varning från befalhavaren.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Thord måste testa sin nya lastbil med roterande kran nar en traktor kraschar nedfor en backe och hamnar på taket. I norr ar Raido på vag att barga en skolbuss som har kort ner i ett dike, men han blir forsenad av två andra raddningsuppdrag. Bilentusiasten Bjorn får ett mote med en elbil.

programme.title: Engineering Europe
programme.desc: Vi avslojar Polens djarvaste tekniska underverk, ser en superhamn resa sig från havets djup, avslojar de anmarkningsvarda designhemligheterna bakom byggandet av EU:s hogsta byggnad, utforskar en vidstrackt underjordisk saltgruva och besoker varldens hogsta trakonstruktion, som ar 111 meter hog.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: Nar vintern narmar sig forbereder sig invånarna i Port Protection på att stanga in sig. Curly hjalper Oliver att ta in några cedertrad, Carl och Morgan ger sig ut for att fiska coho-lax och Veronica och Terri forbereder sig for att laga en god måltid. Under tiden hjalper Sam Troy och Sarah med en storre uppgradering av hemmet och Jiggy ger sig ut for att falla en sista alg for sasongen.

programme.title: Northwoods Survival
programme.desc: Margot och en ”speciell van” gor en sista anstrangning for att fardigstalla sin stuga innan vintern satter in på allvar. Trots ett stort snofall beger sig Billy ut i bushen for att påborja ett ambitiost brobygge. Matty anlitar en person från sitt forflutna for att hjalpa honom att klara sig undan en storm som narmar sig med stormsteg. Och Emilie och Gilbert gor en skakande resa in i vildmarken for att leverera dyrbar last som ar avgorande for att de ska kunna fardigstalla sitt dromhus i Northwoods.

programme.title: CYCLE AROUND JAPAN Highlights
programme.desc: We explore Osaka, a prefecture known for its great cuisine. We meet a couple who fish for daggertooth pike conger (hamo), which taste great in summer, a farmer growing juicy eggplants, and much more.

programme.title: The New Adventures of Rockie and Her Friends
programme.desc: Puppet action show for children. In a distant post-human future where surviving creatures have formed a community, new-breed dinosaur girl Rockie sets out on hilarious adventures with her schoolmates.

programme.title: Fuckings bygda
programme.desc: Mariam er i tyve-årene og lever et hedonistisk liv i Oslo. En dag ringer hennes søster med en sjokkerende beskjed: de må begrave sin far for andre gang. Dette bringer frem minner fra år tilbake- da Mariam fikk et hysterisk latteranfall midt i farens begravelse, på verst tenkelige tidspunkt. Full av skam flyttet hun fra byen i Gudbrandsdalen til Oslo. Søsteren har levd alene med farens gullfisk i barndomshjemmet, og er nå oppsatt på å rette på den forferdelige opplevelsen i forrige begravelse, og gi faren et mer verdig farvel. Søstrene må begynne å snakke sammen etter årevis uten å være i kontakt med hverandre. Men er det for seint?

programme.title: Våre beste år
programme.desc: Siri må tyde det mystiske brevet. Simone trues av FrP-Myksvoll og Svein får et tilbud som er for godt til å være sant.

programme.desc: I eit vakkert hus i Stockholms skjærgård bur Calle og Thomas. Her finst spor til kongelege rom, og huset får nedløpsrøyr som passer eit 1800-talshus.

programme.title: Med hjartet på rette staden

programme.title: Gjensyn med Salmeboka minutt for minutt
programme.desc: Salmeboka minutt for minutt ble sendt i 60 timer før jul i 2014. Alle kor og solister er representert i løpet av serien. Her er utvalgte salmer fra 466 til 514. Med Kor int, Anne Vada, Ragnhild Hadland, The Adult Choir at First Lutheran Church in Dacorah Iowa USA, Luren Singing Society, Nothern Lights, Koriander, Flemma songlag, Mannskoret Lerka, Os mannskor, Dalsbygda skolekor, Ninette, Rondane gospelkor, Sandra Borøy, Hakta-bandet, Tove Ramlo-Ystad, Våle kirkekor, Namdalseid songlag, Strindheim blandakor .

programme.title: Hjem til jul - en intim julekonsert med kjente artister
programme.desc: Vi inviterer til en intim julekonsert på kvelden før selveste julaften. En stemningsfull musikalsk julegave med kjente artister som Maria Mena, Ina Wroldsen, Thomas Dybdahl, Fay Wildhagen, Klovner i kamp, Frida Ånnevik, Carlisle Sienes og koret Oslo Hit Ensemble som synger julen inn og får deg i den rette stemningen.

programme.title: Das groSSe Promi-BuSSen
programme.desc: Nicht nur das Wetter im Camp ist auf dem Tiefpunkt, sondern auch die Laune der Promis. Vor allem Diogo bekommt es von allen Seiten ab. Olivia Jones konfrontiert Emma mit ihrer Vergangenheit: Einst impulsiv und verletzend, wirkt sie heute reflektierter - doch zeigt sie wirklich Reue? Serkan tritt als Letzter zu seiner Runde der Schande an. Was wirft ihm Olivia vor?

programme.title: ProSieben :newstime
programme.desc: Nachrichten live aus Munchen: Die ProSieben :newstime informiert die Zuschauer:innen uber die wichtigsten Themen des Tages aus Politik, Wirtschaft, Sport und Gesellschaft. Karolin Kandler und Michael Marx moderieren die Nachrichtensendung im Wechsel.

programme.title: Greys Anatomy - Die jungen Ärzte
programme.desc: Nach dem schrecklichen Unfall versuchen Alex und Meredith nach Kraften, der verletzten Familie zu helfen. Lily, die alteste Tochter der Familie, beatmet in dieser Zeit das Baby. Im Krankenhaus geht der Kampf um Leben und Tod der Unfallopfer weiter. Teddy steckt immer noch mitten in der Herzoperation. Da sich Komplikationen ergeben, fordert sie Cristina an.

programme.title: Greys Anatomy - Die jungen Ärzte
programme.desc: Owen und Cristina machen Paartherapie und kommen nicht uber die fruhere Abtreibung hinweg. Unter den anderen Kollegen gibt es Zwistigkeiten beruflicher Natur, die sich dann auf diverse Weise auflosen.

programme.title: Greys Anatomy - Die jungen Ärzte
programme.desc: Henry wird blutspuckend eingeliefert und muss sofort operiert werden. Meredith und Alex mussen ein Neugeborenes aus einem anderen Krankenhaus abholen, damit es im Seattle Grace Hospital arztlich versorgt werden kann. Als ihr Wagen eine Panne hat und sie im Unwetter auf Hilfe warten mussen, passiert ein schrecklicher Unfall.

programme.title: Galileo
programme.desc: Eine volle Stunde Galileo, das heiSSt eine volle Stunde Interessantes und Wissenswertes in gewohnter Premium-Qualitat - und mit einer Themenvielfalt, die ihresgleichen sucht. Taglich uberrascht Galileo die Zuschauer mit faszinierenden Bildern zu zahlreichen neuen Rubriken rund um Technik, Leben und skurriles Wissen - wie immer verbluffend einfach und fur jeden verstandlich erklart.

programme.title: Kaminfeuer mit Joko And Klaas
programme.desc: Volle 77 Minuten entspannter und interessanter Talk vor dem Kaminfeuer. In den Hauptrollen: Joko And Klaas. Der Anlass: Eine Strafe im Rahmen von Joko And Klaas gegen ProSieben.

programme.title: taff
programme.desc: Bei taff dreht sich eine Stunde lang alles um die Themen des Tages: die bewegendsten, schonsten, lustigsten und skurrilsten Bilder der letzten 24 Stunden, gut recherchierte Geschichten von Menschen und ihren Schicksalen, die News zu Stars und Sternchen sowie aktuelle Tipps und Trends.

programme.title: Die Cooking Academy
programme.desc: Matilda gibt Juliette Halt in ihrem Gefuhlschaos, bis eine dankbare Geste zu einem schmerzhaften Missverstandnis fuhrt. Alexander mochte Felicitas an ihrem Hochzeitstag uberraschen und muss im Gegenzug der Konkurrentin Matilda seine geliebte Sternekuche uberlassen. Hannes baut heimlich ein illegales Geschaft auf und setzt damit die Zukunft der Taverne aufs Spiel. Wird er weiterhin alle wohlwollenden Warnungen ignorieren?

programme.title: Galileo
programme.desc: Alcatraz - kein Name steht so sehr fur das perfekte Gefangnis wie die beruchtigte Insel vor San Francisco. Doch 1962 gelang drei Haftlingen das Unmogliche: Sie verschwanden spurlos. Jetzt machen sich die Galileo-Reporter Joris und Harro daran, das Ratsel zu luften. Sie reisen nach Alcatraz, treffen Augenzeugen und wagen schlieSSlich selbst den Ausbruchsversuch - unter originalgetreuen Bedingungen.

programme.title: Die Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer findet in seiner Jackentasche eine sechs Jahre alte Filmrolle, die er mit Moes Hilfe entwickelt. Doch die Bilder rufen Erschutterndes in Erinnerung: Bart und Lisa waren als kleine Kinder furchtbar zerstritten – so sehr, dass Marge und Homer in ihrer Verzweiflung Hilfe bei einer Therapeutin suchten. Doch dann gingen die zwei kleinen Streithahne verloren, auf einer abenteuerlichen Reise durch Springfield rettete Bart Lisas Leben, und plotzlich war alles anders…

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Barney muss unentwegt an Quinn denken. Tatsachlich entdeckt er eines Abends bei einem Besuch in seinem Stamm-Striplokal, dass Quinn dort als Tanzerin arbeitet. Barney bittet sie um ein erneutes Date, aber sie will sich mit ihm nur im Club treffen, was zur Folge hat, dass Barney fur ein paar Minuten Gesprach jedes Mal bezahlen muss. Ted ist immer noch traurig wegen Robins Auszug. Um sich abzulenken, sucht er sich ein Hobby, das er in Robins Zimmer ausuben kann.

programme.title: The Middle
programme.desc: Kurz vor Weihnachten hutet Sue ein Geheimnis vor ihrer Familie. Nachdem Brick zugestimmt hat, auf die drei Nachbarskinder aufzupassen, muss er sich vor ihnen verstecken, weil sie zu viel Zeit mit ihm verbringen wollen.

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: Als Charlie und Lyndsey sich naher kommen, bekommt Alan einen Anfall von Verfolgungswahn.

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: Charlie ist wie besessen von der frisch verheirateten Rose und beginnt ihr nachzustellen. Gleichzeitig macht sich Alan Sorgen, weil Jake und Eldridge dumme und extrem gefahrliche Stunts filmen.

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: Um geschaftlich voranzukommen lasst Alan sich unversehens auf ein Pyramidenspiel ein und wirbt seine Freunde und Verwandte als Investoren. Charlie und Rose setzen ihre leidenschaftliche Affare fort - er verliebt sich mehr und mehr in sie.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: Voller Elan arbeiten Sheldon und Dr. Sturgis an ihrer Datenbank. Doch die beiden bekommen Konkurrenz aus den eigenen Reihen: Dr. Linkletter verfolgt einen sehr ahnlichen Plan und ist ihnen dabei sogar einen Schritt voraus. Er beschaftigt bereits einen Programmierer. Die hochschwangere Mandy und die verletzte Meemaw sind derweil ans Bett gefesselt und werden von Mary umsorgt, wahrend Georgie, Missy und George die Geschafte der Videothek und des Waschsalons am Laufen halten.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon meldet sich bei Leonard, nachdem man ihm samtliche Habseligkeiten (und seine Hose) gestohlen hat und er an einem Bahnhof in Arizona gestrandet ist. Bernadette verschafft Penny indes ein Vorstellungsgesprach in ihrem Pharmaunternehmen. Und Howard wundert sich daruber, dass Stuart so gut mit seiner Mutter auskommt. Er kann einfach nicht verstehen, wieso Stuart immer noch bei ihr wohnt.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon darf das Forschungsgebiet wechseln, allerdings nur unter einer Voraussetzung: Er muss als Junior-Professor Vorlesungen halten. Als sich Howard in Sheldons Kurs einschreibt, um seinen Doktor zu machen, sind alle uberrascht. Es dauert aber nicht lange, bis zwischen den beiden die Fetzen fliegen. Auch zwischen Penny und Bernadette kriselt es; ein Zustand, den Amy anfangs sogar begruSSt.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Howard erhalt die Chance, als Astronaut den ersten Ball eines wichtigen Baseballspiels zu werfen. Trotz harten Trainings macht der unsportliche Howard aber keine allzu gute Figur auf dem Feld. Sheldon erklart Leonard und Penny, dass er und Amy das bessere Parchen sind, nachdem er einen wissenschaftlichen Test gemacht hat. Wahrend Leonard den Test nun ebenfalls machen will, ist Penny dagegen.

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Als die Freunde erfahren, dass Barney und Quinn zusammenziehen wollen, beschlieSSen sie, die beiden auseinanderzubringen, wahrend Robin und Ted daruber streiten, wer von ihnen in Quinns Wohnung ziehen darf.

programme.title: The Middle
programme.desc: Die Hecks verbringen den Neujahrstag damit, einen Zombieangriff in Orsons Escape Room abzuwehren und versuchen verzweifelt, den Rekord der Donahues zu brechen.

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: Rose entlarvt Alans Pyramidenspiel - im Gegenzug lernt Alans Roses Model-Ehemann namens Manny kennen. Gleichzeitig wunscht sich Charlie ein intimes Rendezvous mit Rose.

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: Im Auftakt der neunten Staffel kommt alles ans Tageslicht - Ashton Kutcher stoSSt zum Ensemble und ubernimmt die Rolle des unglucklich verliebten Internet-Milliardars Walden Schmidt.

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: Walden Schmidt hat Charlies Haus gekauft und stellt Berta als Haushaltshilfe ein - unter der Bedingung, dass sie bei ihm im Haus wohnt. Berta zieht in Alans altes Zimmer ein, und Alan bricht schweren Herzens seine Zelte ab. Als sich Walden einsam fuhlt, fahrt er mit Alan zu seiner Exfrau Bridget, um sie fur sich zuruckzugewinnen. Doch Bridget hat von Walden endgultig die Nase voll und setzt ihn vor die Tur. Daraufhin betrinken sich Walden und Alan - die Folgen sind verheerend ...

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: Mary redet Mandys Mutter ins Gewissen und fordert sie energisch auf, sich mehr um ihre schwangere Tochter zu kummern. Dumm nur, dass sich Audrey daraufhin etwas zu sehr einmischt und Mary damit vor den Kopf stoSSt. George kommt indes sehr gut mit Mandys Vater Jim klar - und auch Sheldon gibt sich alle Muhe, neue Kontakte zu knupfen.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny wundert sich, wieso Rajs neue Freundin Emily sie anscheinend nicht leiden kann, erfahrt den Grund aber bald. Stuart informiert zudem die anderen, dass er den Comicbuchladen nicht wieder eroffnen kann, da er von der Versicherung nicht genugend Geld fur den Schaden erhalten hat. Daraufhin versuchen die Jungs, ihre Frauen davon zu uberzeugen, in den Laden zu investieren.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon behauptet, dass er und die anderen seit Langerem nichts Aufregendes mehr erfunden haben, da sie von ihren Freundinnen zu sehr abgelenkt wurden. Und das soll sich nun andern: Wahrend die Jungs das Wochenende zuhause verbringen, um neue Ideen zu entwickeln, wollen Penny, Amy und Bernadette nach Las Vegas. Wird es den Jungs nun gelingen, produktiver als sonst zu sein?

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny und Leonard streiten sich wegen des lieben Geldes und suchen Rat bei Howard und Bernadette. Raj und Sheldon uberlegen indes, ob sie an einer Studie zu dunkler Materie teilnehmen konnen und prufen, ob sie den Bedingungen in einer Mine unter Tage standhalten wurden. Amy soll das Experiment uberwachen, wahrend Raj und Sheldon im Keller der Universitat trainieren.

programme.title: taff
programme.desc: Bei taff dreht sich eine Stunde lang alles um die Themen des Tages: die bewegendsten, schonsten, lustigsten und skurrilsten Bilder der letzten 24 Stunden, gut recherchierte Geschichten von Menschen und ihren Schicksalen, die News zu Stars und Sternchen sowie aktuelle Tipps und Trends.
